sentences.en: Ex-cavations have revealed Roman and Anglo-Saxon remains in the area.
sentences.cn: 挖掘工作已显示在该地区有罗马和盎格鲁-撒克逊时代的遗迹。

sentences.en: extensive Roman remains (= of ancient buildings ) at Arles
sentences.cn: 阿尔勒的一大片古罗马遗迹

sentences.en: He remains a towering figure in modern British politics.
sentences.cn: 他在现代英国政坛上一直是位杰出的人物。

sentences.en: He remains in a critical condition in a California hospital.
sentences.cn: 他在加州的一家医院里，病情仍然十分危急。

sentences.en: He remains the anchor of the country's fragile political balance.
sentences.cn: 他仍然是维系该国脆弱的政治平衡的支柱。

sentences.en: He wiped off the remains of the lather with a towel.
sentences.cn: 他用毛巾抹去余下的皂沫。

sentences.en: His basic outlook remains anchored in the liberal tradition.
sentences.cn: 他的基本观念依旧扎根于自由主义传统。

sentences.en: It remains to be seen whether her parliamentary colleagues will agree.
sentences.cn: 她的国会同僚是否同意，现在还无从知晓。

sentences.en: Mona remains unshaken by her ordeal and is matter-of-fact about her courage.
sentences.cn: 莫娜不为她经历的这场磨难所动，对自己表现出的勇气也态度淡然。

sentences.en: She confessed to the killing and led police to his remains.
sentences.cn: 她交代人是她杀的，并带警察去他的尸首处。

sentences.en: The festival remains a valuable showcase for new talent.
sentences.cn: 音乐节一直是新秀展示才华的宝贵机会。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister remains the main story in today's newspapers.
sentences.cn: 首相今天仍是各大报纸的主要报道对象.

sentences.en: The room remains simple with bare, stippled green walls.
sentences.cn: 房间仍然很简朴，四面都是饰有圆点的绿色空墙。

sentences.en: The topic of addiction remains something of a taboo.
sentences.cn: 毒瘾仍然是个有些忌讳的话题。

sentences.en: The unrecognizable remains of a man had been found.
sentences.cn: 一具无法辨认的男性尸体被发现了。

sentences.en: They were tidying up the remains of their picnic.
sentences.cn: 他们正在收拾野餐后剩下的东西。

words.tran_cn: [数] 余数，残余；剩余物；其余的人

trans.tran_cn: 遗骨，遗体，残骸，残余，遗迹，废墟，遗址，遗迹，剩余（物），余额
trans.tran_en: the parts of something that are left after the rest has been destroyed or has disappeared

trans.tran_cn: 留下( remain 的第三人称单数)，保持，留待，仍然是
